recipesJson.name: Fruity Loopers
recipesJson.author: Fuzzy055
recipesJson.description: A fruit loops with milk recipe. Lemon is the main note you will taste its not a pungent lemon flavor more like a sweet candied lemon flavor helped out by a noticeable sweet candied orange flavor with accents of a candied strawberry all sitting in a amazing puffed corn base with the perfect amount of sweet cereal milk. Really good stuff!
